newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT -- Morgan on oil, natgas prices, cos.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT -- Morgan on oil, natgas prices, cos.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley said it raised its 1997 estimate on West Texas Intermediate crude to $20 per barrel from $18.50 and its estimate on natural gas for next year to $2.25 per thousand cubic feet (MCF) from $2.
-- Morgan also upgraded USX-Marathon Group and Louis Dreyfus Natural Gas Corp to strong buy from outperform.
